statement: ImmunoPrecise Antibodies Ltd. (IPA) has partnered with RIBOPRO, a provider of mRNA and lipid nanoparticle technologies, to advance mRNA-driven antibody discovery. The collaboration aims to revolutionize the discovery and development of therapeutic antibodies by integrating RIBOPRO's advanced mRNA-based antigen expression expertise with IPA's in silico and wet-lab antibody discovery capabilities. The partnership aims to accelerate the creation of novel immunotherapies and enhance therapeutic antibody discovery.
introduction: ImmunoPrecise Antibodies Ltd. has partnered with RIBOPRO to integrate mRNA-based antigen expression with their antibody discovery capabilities to accelerate the development of novel immunotherapies.

statement: Middleby Corporation has announced its plan to separate its Food Processing business into a standalone public company, driven by its ability to drive efficiencies and industry innovation. The company's kitchen equipment businesses produced strong 2024 financial results, with $2,419 million in revenue and $664 million in Adjusted EBITDA, with an Adjusted EBITDA margin of over 27%. The move is expected to unlock value for shareholders, with the company's fourth-quarter net sales beating estimates and adjusted earnings per share surpassing expectations.
introduction: Middleby Corporation plans to spin off its Food Processing business into a standalone public company, driven by strong 2024 financial results and potential to unlock value for shareholders.
